T02D3158:179a-1: h'a la h'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D3158:179a-3: snying rje khros pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3158:179a-4: snying rje khros pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3158:179a-5: sngar bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02D3158:179a-6: sa bon gyi yi ge hr'i: yongs su rdzogs pa
T02D3158:179a-7: las snying rje khros pa'i thugs rje chen po zhal
T02D3158:179a-8: gsum pa nyid yang spyan gsum pa ral pa dang
T02D3158:179a-9: dbu rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
T02D3158:179a-10: dang po'i zhal dkar pa g-yas pa sngo ba g-yon
T02D3158:179a-11: pa dmar ba zla ba phyed pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D3158:179a-12: dbu la thod pas thod byas pa ral pa'i mtha'
T02D3158:179a-13: na ri dags kyi pags pa rgyan thams cad kyis
T02D3158:179a-14: legs par brgyan pa shin tu dkar ba gangs kyi
T02D3158:179a-15: ri bo dang mtshungs par snang ba sgeg pa'i nyams
T02D3158:179a-16: dang ldan pas shin tu mdzes pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-17: zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan zhing phyag drug pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa ste /
T02D3158:179a-18: phyag g-yas pa ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-20: gsum pa ni mda' gar thabs su bsnams pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-21: g-yon pa mi bskyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-22: de bzhin du gnyis pas ni padma dkar po'o //
T02D3158:179a-23: gsum pas ni gzhu nyid do //
T02D3158:179a-24: pus mo g-yon pa nas mdog dkar pa'i lha mos brten pa ste /
T02D3158:179a-25: g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa phyag g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das la ched du 'khyud par mdzad pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-26: ral pa'i tshogs la me tog gis mdzes par gyur pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-27: g-yas kyi zur na sprul gyis dkris pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D3158:179a-28: g-yon gyi zur na padma la gnas pa'i thod pa
T02D3158:179a-29: me tog dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyis legs par
T02D3158:179a-30: bkang ba'o // padma dmar po dang zla ba la
T02D3158:179a-31: g-yon bslang ba'i phyed krung gis bskyod par gnas pa'i
T02D3158:179a-32: bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3158:179a-33: de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya ste /
